statement.script: CREATE TABLE pgist_cst_cat_tag_link ( cctid bigint, isid bigint, ioid bigint, crid bigint, trid bigint );

CREATE VIEW view_structure_discussions AS SELECT s.id as isid, 0 as ioid, d.id as did from pgist_discussion d, pgist_info_structure s where d.id=s.discussion_id UNION SELECT s.id as isid, o.id as ioid, d.id as did from pgist_discussion d, pgist_info_structure s, pgist_info_object o where d.id=o.discussion_id and o.structure_id=s.id;

CREATE VIEW view_cct_concern_tags AS SELECT c.cct_id as cctid, c.id as cid, c.author_id as uid, l.tagref_id as trid, t.id as tid, t.name as tname FROM pgist_cvo_concerns c, pgist_cvo_concern_tag_link l, pgist_cvo_tag_refs r, pgist_tags t WHERE c.deleted is false AND c.id=l.concern_id AND r.id=l.tagref_id AND t.id=r.tag_id;

CREATE VIEW view_structure_concern_tags AS SELECT s.cctid as cctid, 0 as isid, 0 as ioid, c.id as cid, l.tagref_id as trid from pgist_info_structure s, pgist_cvo_concerns c, pgist_cvo_concern_tag_link l where s.cctid=c.cct_id and l.concern_id=c.id and l.tagref_id not in (select trid from pgist_cst_cat_tag_link) UNION SELECT l2.cctid as cctid, l2.isid as isid, l2.ioid as ioid, l1.concern_id as cid, l2.trid as trid from pgist_cvo_concern_tag_link l1 join pgist_cst_cat_tag_link l2 on l1.tagref_id=trid;

CREATE VIEW view_post_reply_tags AS SELECT s.id AS isid, 0 AS ioid, d.id AS did, p.id AS pid, 0 AS rid, t.tag_id AS tid FROM pgist_discussion d, pgist_discussion_post p, pgist_dpost_tag_link t, pgist_info_structure s WHERE d.id=s.discussion_id and p.deleted is false and p.discussion_id=d.id and t.dpost_id=p.id UNION SELECT s.id AS isid, o.id AS ioid, d.id AS did, p.id AS pid, 0 AS rid, t.tag_id AS tid FROM pgist_discussion d, pgist_discussion_post p, pgist_dpost_tag_link t, pgist_info_structure s, pgist_info_object o WHERE d.id=o.discussion_id and p.deleted is false and p.discussion_id=d.id and t.dpost_id=p.id and o.structure_id=s.id UNION SELECT s.id AS isid, 0 AS ioid, d.id AS did, p.id AS pid, r.id AS rid, t.tag_id AS tid FROM pgist_discussion d, pgist_discussion_post p, pgist_discussion_reply r, pgist_dreply_tag_link t, pgist_info_structure s WHERE d.id=s.discussion_id and p.deleted is false and p.discussion_id=d.id and t.dreply_id=r.id and r.deleted is false and p.id=r.parent_id UNION SELECT s.id AS isid, o.id AS ioid, d.id AS did, p.id AS pid, r.id AS rid, t.tag_id AS tid FROM pgist_discussion d, pgist_discussion_post p, pgist_discussion_reply r, pgist_dreply_tag_link t, pgist_info_structure s, pgist_info_object o WHERE d.id=o.structure_id and p.discussion_id=d.id and p.deleted is false and t.dreply_id=r.id and r.deleted is false and o.structure_id=s.id and r.parent_id=p.id;

CREATE VIEW view_dpost_tag_link AS SELECT p.discussion_id as did, p.id as pid, l.tag_id as tid, t.name as tname from pgist_discussion_post p, pgist_discussion d, pgist_dpost_tag_link l, pgist_tags t where p.discussion_id=d.id and p.deleted is false and l.dpost_id=p.id and l.tag_id=t.id;
